tool_description: Creates comprehensive audit trails for all taxpayer profile activities, system changes, and administrative actions with secure timestamping.

event_type.description: Type of event to log (profile_creation, profile_update, document_upload, status_change, etc.)

taxpayer_id.description: Taxpayer ID associated with the event

user_id.description: ID of user or system performing the action

affected_fields.description: Profile fields affected by the event

ip_address.description: IP address of user performing action

error_messages: Invalid event type: Event type is not recognized in audit system
Missing taxpayer ID: Taxpayer ID is required for audit trail
Invalid user ID: User ID not found in system
Audit trail creation failed: Could not create audit entry due to system error
Incomplete event details: Event details must contain sufficient information for audit purposes
usage: Specify event type, taxpayer ID, user ID, and event details. Include field changes and values for update events. Tool creates secure, tamper-proof audit entries.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for the audit trail entry

timestamp.description: Secure timestamp of the audited event

audit_hash.description: Cryptographic hash for audit trail integrity
